inputs.label: Name
inputs.name: name
inputs.description: The name of the list.

inputs.label: State
inputs.name: state
inputs.description: The state for the list contact.

inputs.label: Zip
inputs.name: zip
inputs.description: The postal or zip code for the list contact.

inputs.label: Phone
inputs.name: phone
inputs.description: The phone number for the list contact.

inputs.label: Company
inputs.name: company
inputs.description: The company name for the list.

inputs.label: Address 1
inputs.name: address1
inputs.description: The street address for the list contact.

inputs.label: Address 2
inputs.name: address2
inputs.description: The street address for the list contact.

inputs.label: City
inputs.name: city
inputs.description: The city for the list contact.

inputs.label: Country
inputs.name: country
inputs.description: A two-character ISO3166 country code. Defaults to US if invalid.

inputs.label: Permission Reminder
inputs.name: permissionReminder
inputs.description: The permission reminder for the list.

inputs.label: From Name
inputs.name: fromName
inputs.description: The default from name for campaigns sent to this list.

inputs.label: From Email
inputs.name: fromEmail
inputs.description: The default from email for campaigns sent to this list.

inputs.label: Subject
inputs.name: subject
inputs.description: The default subject line for campaigns sent to this list.

inputs.label: Language
inputs.name: language
inputs.description: The default language for this lists's forms.

inputs.label: Email Type Option
inputs.name: emailTypeOption
inputs.description: Whether the list supports multiple formats for emails. When set to true, subscribers can choose whether they want to receive HTML or plain-text emails. When set to false, subscribers will receive HTML emails, with a plain-text alternative backup.

inputs.label: Use Archive Bar
inputs.name: useArchiveBar
inputs.description: Whether campaigns for this list use the Archive Bar in archives by default.

inputs.label: Notify On Subscribe
inputs.name: notifyOnSubscribe
inputs.description: The email address to send subscribe notifications to.

inputs.label: Notify On Unsubscribe
inputs.name: notifyOnUnsubscribe
inputs.description: The email address to send unsubscribe notifications to.

inputs.label: Double Optin
inputs.name: doubleOptin
inputs.description: Whether or not to require the subscriber to confirm subscription via email.

inputs.label: Marketing Permissions
inputs.name: marketingPermissions
inputs.description: Whether or not the list has marketing permissions (eg. GDPR) enabled.
